metadata.description: AAD Client Application Id
AAD Cluster Application Id
AAD Tenant Id
Address prefix for the virtual network
Remote desktop user password. Must be a strong password
Remote desktop user Id
Name for the storage account that contains application diagnostics data from the cluster
Replication option for the VM image storage account
Certificate Common Name
Certificate Issuer Thumbprint
Certificate Thumbprint
Refers to the location URL in your key vault where the certificate was uploaded, it is should be in the format of https://<name of the vault>.vault.azure.net:443/secrets/<exact location>
Name of your cluster - Between 3 and 23 characters. Letters and numbers only
DNS Name for the Public IP. Must be unique in the region

Production workloads require a durability level of Silver or Gold to help avoid data loss from VM-level infrastructure requests. https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-fabric/service-fabric-cluster-capacity
Application port range end
Application port range start
Ephemeral port range end
Ephemeral port range start
HTTP gateway port
TCP gateway port
Name of the public IP address used by the load balancer
Name of the network security group
Name of the network interface
Instance count for node type 0
Instance count for node type 1
Production workloads require a reliability level of Silver or greater (more than 5 nodes). https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-fabric/service-fabric-cluster-capacity
Resource Id of the key vault, is should be in the format of /subscriptions/<Sub ID>/resourceGroups/<Resource group name>/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/<vault name>
Managed disk storage account type
Name of the subnet for the cluster nodetype 0
Subnet prefix for the cluster nodetype 0
Name of the subnet for the cluster nodetype 0
Subnet prefix for the cluster nodetype 1
Name for the storage account that contains support logs from the cluster
Replication option for the support log storage account
Name of the virtual network
VM image offer
VM image Publisher
VM image SKU
VM image version
Name of the VM node type 0
Size of the VM for nodetype 0
Name of the VM node type 1
Size of the VM for nodetype 1

properties.description: This is required rule to allow SFRP to connect to the cluster. This rule cannot be overridden.
This is required rule to allow SFRP to connect to the cluster. This rule cannot be overridden.
Optional rule to open SF cluster gateway ports. To override add a custom NSG rule for gateway ports in priority range 1000-3000.
Optional rule to open RDP ports. To override add a custom NSG rule for RDP port in priority range 1000-3000.
This is required rule to allow SF Extension to connect to download center to download the cab. This rule cannot be overridden.
